item.title: Johnny Hates Jazz - Shattered Dreams - Baritone Ukulele - Key of Am, A#m
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for DGBE Ukulele.
Chords used: Em, Bm, C, Am, D, A, Fm, Eb, Bb, C#, Bbm
As performed by Johnny Hates Jazz
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/pdSr1ZjAWuE
Chord chart ("Tabs") available at: https://ukutabs.com/j/johnny-hates-jazz/shattered-dreams/
************************************************
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. Motion video background from https://www.motionbolt.com
Check out the UkeStuff Podcast, where I talk about ukulele education and my own ukulele experiences. Available on Radio Public, Apple Podcasts, Google Play, Spotify, and Stitcher. If you don't have a podcast app, please check out Radio Public for all your podcasts--they support podcasters financially.
You are invited to visit my ukulele blog/website, ukestuff.info (a free resource). Also on social media: Twitter (@UkeStuff) and Instagram (@ukestuff.info).
Want to make a donation towards this work? Visit https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ukestuff
Are you a teacher using ukulele in the classroom? Check out my video based method...effective, easy, and inexpensive! https://ukestuff.wordpress.com/the-video-ukulele-method/
Check out the "merch": https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
Thanks for watching the videos and supporting the channel! Your support of these videos and subscription to the channel makes it possible to produce this content.

item.title: Elvis Presley - Suspicious Minds - Key of Am
item.description:
Ukulele play along
Suspicious Minds - Elvis Presley Written by Mark James
Using the chords: Bm B7 C D D7 Em G
Suggested Strum Patterns: D DU U DU
This video is meant for educational purposes.
No copyright infringement intended

item.title: Original Broadway Cast of Hamilton - Satisfied - Key of Am
item.description:
Satisfied from Hamilton. It’s been lowered by 3 semitones so beginner ukulele players can play along. Chord used: Am, D, F, and E7. The lyric video was created and posted by YouTuber LyricsBy Allie, I simply added the chords. The simplified chords were inspired by YouTuber Cory Teaches Music. For educational use.
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: You Gotta Sing Ukulele Play Along - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Am.
Chords Used: Am, E7, Dm
As performed by Nancy Cassidy.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JWGOXTMNwSA
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. Video from motionbolt.com.

item.title: Carly Simon - You're So Vain - Key of Am
item.description:
You’re So Vain by Carly Simon. For educational use. Chords Used: Am F G Em7 C Dm
Boomwhacker Play Along Link - https://youtu.be/3Bam-r3RkJ8
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Revenge (Minecraft) - Ukulele Play Along - Key of Am
item.description:
Revenge by CaptainSparklez, A Minecraft Parody of Usher's DJ Got Us Fallin' In Love. For educational use. It’s been raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. Chords Used: Am G F
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.

item.title: Eagles Of Death Metal - I Only Want You - Key of Am
item.description: At the request of a subscriber, here's an educational play along video that uses just 2 chords: C and Am. I have another version of it that has other parts on the screen (drums, boomwhackers, etc) that may be found here (https://youtu.be/5Nt1bF5a3j0), but this version is just for ukulele.

item.title: Sarah Jeffery - Queen of Mean - Key of Am
item.description:
Queen of Mean from Descendants 3. It’s been raised by 2 semitones so beginner ukulele students can play along. It’s just the first part of the song, and it is abruptly cut off at the key change. For educational use. Chords Used: Am F G Dm
If you found this video useful please subscribe. If you want to be notified of future videos please click on bell next to subscribe.
Do you have a request for a song to be made into a video? First, check the index of play along videos at www.ukeplayalongs.com to make sure your song isn't already available. If it isn't, please fill out this request form: https://forms.gle/84rgm7kFNJWnTqFB6. We cannot promise that a request will be made into a play along, but we do appreciate your recommendations!

item.title: OneRepublic - Rescue Me - Key of Am
item.description:
For educational use. Optimized for GCEA ukulele. Key of Am. Lowered a whole step from the original key, because some people are really going to struggle with the Bm from the original key (that version is also available). Side note: keep practicing and you'll master it!
Chords Used: Am, G, C, F
As performed by OneRepublic. This was a request from my own two boys, age 7 & 10. If you read these comments, they would be thrilled if you watched some of their videos and followed them.
Older son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCnXyBzSlqfs_N0Sz8EeTj7Q Younger son: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCLCD1tFgLd6rgT1WzdR4paA
And if you are reading all of this, please follow my other ukulele channel: https://www.youtube.com/ukestuff As these videos cannot be monetized, subscriptions and views on the other channel really will help me out.
Tutorial Video (GCEA & DGBE): https://youtu.be/JZA5jnT4brY
Video created on the iPad Pro using Luma Fusion. The ukulele chord font is available at ukefarm.com. The motion video is from churchmediadrop.com
Interested in UkeStuff merchandise? https://teespring.com/stores/ukestuff
